alert.note: Alert for Bowie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 6:15PM CDT until April 20 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LITTLE RIVER...SOUTHEASTERN MCCURTAIN AND BOWIE COUNTIES... At 614 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of New Boston to near De Kalb to near Dalby Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... New Boston, Hooks, De Kalb, Maud, Dalby Springs, Wallace, Almont, Arden, Spring Hill, Beaverdams, Red Bank and Goodlake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
